intro: Soar into WWI dogfights with arcade-style aerial combat and thrilling multiplayer action!
description:
Take to the skies and become a WWI flying ace in Biplanes, an exciting arcade-style aerial combat game that captures the thrill of classic dogfighting action!

Intense Aerial Combat
Pilot your biplane through intense dogfights against enemy aces. Master the art of aerial combat as you loop, barrel roll, and outmaneuver your opponents in fast-paced battles. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the skies, intuitive controls make it easy to jump in and start flying.

Multiple Game Modes
•	Campaign Mode - Team up with up to 3 friends in cooperative missions against waves of AI enemies. Work together to become the ultimate flying aces! Replay missions to earn higher medals with faster victories!
•	Versus Mode - Battle against friends and AI opponents in intense local multiplayer combat with four exciting rulesets: 
	o	Classic - Pure arcade dogfighting! Destroy balloons and enemy planes to score points. One-hit eliminations, no power-ups, no evasive roll—just skilled flying and sharp shooting
	o	Modern - Fast-paced action with power-ups, evasive rolls, and life bars. Collect points by taking down balloons and opponents in this enhanced combat experience
	o	Survivor - Modern rules with a twist—no respawning! Be the last pilot standing as you eliminate every opponent in this high-stakes free-for-all
	o	Base Bombing - Team-based warfare! Join the Red or Blue team, collect bombs from the central tower, and destroy the enemy base while defending your own

Classic Arcade Action
Experience the golden age of arcade gaming with responsive controls, satisfying gameplay, and that "one more try" appeal that keeps you coming back. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or extended play.

Features:
•	Thrilling WWI-era biplane flight mechanics and battlefield environments
•	Smooth, accessible flight controls for players of all skill levels
•	Local multiplayer for up to 4 players in both cooperative and competitive modes
•	Four distinct Versus rulesets offering varied tactical gameplay
•	Multiple enemy AI difficulty settings in Versus Mode to match your skill level
•	Vibrant visuals and immersive sound effects
•	Pick-up-and-play arcade gameplay that's easy to learn, challenging to master

Whether you're teaming up with friends in Campaign Mode or battling for supremacy in Versus Mode, Biplanes delivers pure arcade flying fun. Strap in, throttle up, and prepare for takeoff!
